settings.html:
Unleash Limitless Possibilities


Tired of slow, unreliable internet in rural areas or on the go? When it comes to reliable and unlimited internet, you need a modem that can keep up with your mobile lifestyle. Meet the Nomad Raptor – the best-in-class 5G-enabled modem designed especially for the digital nomad. Experience ground-breaking 5G and 4G LTE speeds up to 3.3 Gbps, so you can never surf the net with no slowdowns. Enjoy nearly limitless potential with the ability to connect up to 128 devices at once with advanced secure Wi-Fi 6 technology. Never worry about signal strength again with its dual SIM card, providing auto-switching from signal to signal to ensure no interruption, no matter where your life takes you. You deserve better internet and speed, so join the new era of connectivity with the Nomad Raptor today and go places both near and far without ever missing a beat.

Here’s Why You’ll Love This

Lightning-fast speeds:

With state-of-the-art Wi-Fi 6 technology and gigabit-class data rates, The Nomad Raptor delivers lightning-fast speeds for all your internet needs.

Secure connections:

The Nomad Raptor provides secure connections for up to 128 devices, giving you peace of mind while you surf the web.

Unlimited internet access:

Whether you're a digital nomad, RVer, or simply live in a rural area, The Nomad Raptor gives you unlimited internet access wherever you are.

Best-in-class 5G-enabled modem:

With a best-in-class 5G-enabled modem and download speeds of up to 3.3 Gbps*, you'll be able to connect and stream like never before.

Superior connectivity:

The Nomad Raptor allows you to connect up to two carrier SIMs with auto-switching based on signal strength, ensuring you always have a reliable and secure internet connection.

settings.testimonial_description: Nomad was created to bring internet to rural communities and RV, Van and travelers on the go! We know connecting in these areas can be difficult, so we’re here to help find the right plan for you.

We just ordered our router and plan to begin service with Nomad.  During the process we had some questions but the customer service team quickly responded and helped us in getting the router with best coverage in our location.

I haven’t even gotten the device yet, and I love this company already. The speedy and friendly customer service is amazing. I am looking forward to getting our device and I know I will be referring many people to Nomad Internet.

settings.heading: See what satisfied Nomads across the country have to say

settings.title: 7 Day, No Risk, Money-Back Guarantee.
settings.description: "High-Speed Internet that works anywhere you live and travel". Sounds too good to be true? Try it risk-free and see for yourself.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.html:
IS ALL OF THIS FOR REAL? THIS SEEMS TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE!
YES we are for real! We started the Nomad Internet Community years ago to provide flat-rate, affordable internet access to individuals who do not have access to traditional high-speed internet options and suffer from extreme overage charges. Our community of members benefit from our ‘on the go’ plans/devices which they are able to utilize during their membership. Our mission is to connect the unconnected.
HOW IS THIS DIFFERENT FROM MY PHONE PLAN?
The phone plans that carriers normally offer are for data used just on your phone. Instead, Nomad Internet is specifically designed to provide High-Speed Wi-Fi for EVERY connected device in your home or office including laptops, smart TVs, gaming consoles and other Wi-Fi connected devices
WHICH DEVICE IS RIGHT FOR ME?
The two main devices types that we offer are hotspots and routers. Routers are best for most home/office setups, as they provide far superior range and connectivity, while hotspots provide a battery powered solution to take your WIFI on the go. All of our devices ship pre-configured and plug-and-play, which means setup is simply connecting the power cable to the wall so you can spend less time setting-up and more time surfing the web! Goodbye invasive installs. Hello Nomad Internet. Please note that the devices displayed on our site are only for illustration purposes. The device you receive might differ, as we change the router we use based on what works best in your area.
DO I HAVE TO SIGN A CONTRACT? CREDIT CHECK? ARE THESE REALLY MONTH-TO-MONTH PLANS?
All of our plans require no contract, and no credit checks! Yes, these are month to month plans. Each payment pre-pays for your next 30 days of membership. You may of course cancel your subscription with us at anytime by simply returning your device to Nomad Internet. Monthly charges will continue until the device has been received. Additionally, our 7-Day Money Back Guarantee allows you to try our service at No Risk! If the service does not meet your needs in any way, simply return the device for a complete refund of your entire order!
WHICH PLAN IS BEST FOR ME?
Each color represents one of the major cellular carrier networks. Therefore, the primary difference between each plan is the coverage each network provides. View each of our plan’s coverage to identify which is most likely to work at your usage location(s). For help with selecting a plan, visit the Help Me Choose page for detailed step-by-step instructions.
WHAT HAPPENS IF WHAT I CHOOSE DOESN’T WORK?
If the plan you initially choose does not connect or is slower than expected, this most likely means a lack of LTE coverage/reception at your location, or less commonly, the cellular tower your device is connecting to is either using outdated antennas or is congested from high usage in your area. Regardless of the reason, our 7-Day No Risk Return Policy has you completely covered. Simply return your device for a 100% Refund and let us help you choose another plan that’s best for you!

Live Your Life, Your Way, Without Losing Touch

You never want the people you love to wonder “whatever happened to …” you. On the other hand, you can’t imagine living in the city, or perhaps even in any one place for too long.

High-Speed 4G LTE

Nomad uses 4G LTE technology to connect you to the nation’s leading carriers - for fast reliable internet

Up to Unlimited Data/All Your Devices

Nomad’s devices are specifically designed to connect to the closest cellular towers, to provide the strongest signal possible. This lets you use all your devices to tap into Wi-Fi

Why 4G often is better than satellite

In addition to much cheaper activation costs, you don’t have to remove trees, mount heavy, expensive equipment or wait for the rain to pass to use our fast, reliable 4G LTE signal

7-Day No Risk - Money Back Guarantee

Once you receive your router, it's just a few simple steps to getting online. If for some reason it doesn’t work, our support team is ready to help. In the rare event they can’t, we'll give you your money back, guaranteed

Go Where You Wanna Go

At Nomad, your connection is our mission. We're committed to providing On-the-Go Internet service to people in RVs, Van also, connect people in rural communities that don’t have service. Let us find the plan for you!

No Contract, No Credit Check

With Nomad, you have one less hassle. Your monthly payment pre-pays for your service. That’s all there is to it! Check out our and let us find the one for you!

settings.html:
Cutting-edge technology for unlimited, fast internet on the go!

Are you tired of struggling to find reliable internet while on vacation or in rural areas? Tired of slow internet speeds as more people connect to the same WiFi? Say goodbye to those frustrations with Nomad AIR!


Our all-new Nomad AIR is a cutting-edge internet solution that delivers incredible speeds of up to 1 Gbps*, allowing you to connect with up to 30 devices at a time without slowing down. Whether you're a digital nomad, a Rural Area Resident, or an RVer, Nomad AIR is perfect for you.


Not only is Nomad AIR great for travel, but it also offers 5G speeds, making it ideal for remote offices, medical facilities, dorms, apartments, and other places. And with dual sim card compatibility, Nomad AIR automatically switches between sims to provide you with the best possible speed, ensuring that you always have a strong, reliable connection.


The Nomad Air supports two SIM cards and may automatically switch between them based on signal quality, data use, service availability, and other factors. The Air can be used with most of the top international carriers thanks to multi-carrier firmware.

Here’s Why You’ll Love This

Unlimited, fast internet

Say goodbye to slow internet and hello to lightning-fast speeds, up to 1 Gbps. Nomad AIR is a cutting-edge, enterprise-grade internet solution designed to keep you connected no matter where you go. Whether you're a digital nomad, remote worker, or RV enthusiast, you can use Nomad AIR without the worry of speed fluctuations or signal dropouts

Connect with multiple devices

Nomad AIR allows you to connect with up to 30 devices at a time, making it perfect for families, groups, and businesses.

Perfect for travel

Great for travel, Nomad Air offers breakthrough 5G and 4G LTE speeds, making it perfect for Rural Area Residents, RVers, and Digital Nomads. But it doesn’t end there! Nomad Air is also ideal for residences, shops, restaurants, remote offices, medical facilities, dorms, apartments, and other places.

Dual sim compatibility

Utilizing dual SIM cards and connecting to the most reliable 5G networks, Nomad AIR keeps you connected even in the most remote locations. Say goodbye to expensive satellite internet, and say hello to a world of unlimited possibilities. With Nomad AIR, you can travel in confidence knowing your connection is secure, fast, and always on.

Enterprise-grade security

Enterprise-grade security: Nomad AIR provides advanced security features, including OpenVPN, access control, end-to-end device security, threat identification, monitoring and alerts, and more. This ensures that your internet connection is always safe and secure.


Don't settle for slow, unreliable internet anymore.
Choose Nomad AIR and experience the power of unlimited, fast internet on the go.

settings.title: What is Nomad Internet?
settings.answer: Nomad Internet is America's largest Wireless Internet Service Provider. We are focused on providing High-Speed wireless Internet to rural communities all over the country and on-the-road travelers!

settings.title: How does Nomad Internet work?
settings.answer: Instead of using traditional Internet wires, we do it by transmitting wireless Internet access directly to your home, business, and even while traveling! We combine the latest technology with the nation's largest network to provide high-speed internet to rural locations and traveling nomads. We offer a variety of internet plans, allowing you to choose one that fits your needs.

settings.title: Do I need to sign a contract to use Nomad Internet?
settings.answer: No contract with Nomad Internet. You get to choose the subscription plan that’s best for you.

settings.title: Is Nomad Internet secure?
settings.answer: Yes, all Nomad Internet modems let you use public IPs. Multiple layers of encryption, enhanced Wi-Fi security, firewall filtering, built-in VPN support, IT admin controls, and other features to deliver strong security at every level.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for gaming?
settings.answer: Yes. Even if you are in the most remote location, we will provide you with robust and reliable internet for all your gaming needs. No matter your plan, you can expect fast internet with low ping rates and latency.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for RVing?
settings.answer: Nomad Internet users can take the same high-speed, low-latency service they have at home to any location Nomad Internet has coverage. Nomad Internet for RVers/travelers will allow users to pause and un-pause service based on their individual travel needs.
